remarks: L'Hôpital's Rule for limits from the right.  If ` F ` and ` G ` are differentiable real functions on ` ( A , B ) ` , and ` F ` and ` G ` both approach 0 at ` A ` , and ` G ( x ) ` and ` G ` ' ` ( x ) ` are not zero on ` ( A , B ) ` , and the limit of ` F ` ' ` ( x ) / G ` ' ` ( x ) ` at ` A ` is ` C ` , then the limit ` F ( x ) / G ( x ) ` at ` A ` also exists and equals ` C ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2016.)
statement:
lhop1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
lhop1.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR* ) $.
lhop1.l $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
lhop1.f $e |- ( ph -> F : ( A (,) B ) --> RR ) $.
lhop1.g $e |- ( ph -> G : ( A (,) B ) --> RR ) $.
lhop1.if $e |- ( ph -> dom ( RR _D F ) = ( A (,) B ) ) $.
lhop1.ig $e |- ( ph -> dom ( RR _D G ) = ( A (,) B ) ) $.
lhop1.f0 $e |- ( ph -> 0 e. ( F limCC A ) ) $.
lhop1.g0 $e |- ( ph -> 0 e. ( G limCC A ) ) $.
lhop1.gn0 $e |- ( ph -> -. 0 e. ran G ) $.
lhop1.gd0 $e |- ( ph -> -. 0 e. ran ( RR _D G ) ) $.
lhop1.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( ( z e. ( A (,) B ) |-> ( ( ( RR _D F ) ` z ) / ( ( RR _D G ) ` z ) ) ) limCC A ) ) $.
lhop1 $p |- ( ph -> C e. ( ( z e. ( A (,) B ) |-> ( ( F ` z ) / ( G ` z ) ) ) limCC A ) ) $.
